title: Any help VERY much appreciated...
content:
I am desperately trying to identify the font used in the image I have attached. If anyone has any ideas, they would be greatly appreciated. I am interested in using this font to finish off a design I’m working on...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122411im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/ieselross_6136.jpg)

 [‹ Hand-Lettered "Burtonesque" feel](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45031 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Great Wall logo humanist sans - ITC Stone Sans {Nick Cooke} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122411/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45023 "Go to next forum topic")
author: glendaydesigns
